objectId.description: The ID to which the disease ontology term is applied. #TODO fold this into objectRelation and reference basicGeneInformation.json

objectName.description: optional name for the object for which this annotation is based.

objectRelation.description: Constrains the disease object, associationType and inferredGeneAssociation

negation.description: The negative qualifier for the annotation.

items.description: for calculated submissions, this field represents the id of the genetic objects (allele or affectedGenomicModel) that this annotation is based on.

dataProvider.description: source of data, can be multiple of these, each with a type and a crossReference

evidence.description: one pub + many evidence codes per annotation.

dateAssigned.description: Date this entity was assigned in it's primary data source.

items.description: all the experimental conditions that participate with the disease annotation as defined by the conditionRelationType
